summary: A new Dwemer ruin lying beneath the volcanic plains of Eastmarch.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b]The Path to Erzvasel [/b]- Part 2[/size]

[i]- Kahanesel - [/i]

Two weeks have passed since Ancevo the Great had discovered Direbrozel, and found his next step in the journey to find 'The Gate' hidden in the lost city of Erzvasel. His journey has taken him far east to the volcanic plains, to a ruin named Kahanesel, where the Dwemer have tapped vast stores of geothermal energies. Here, Ancevo hopes to find the location to his prize.

And now the Dragonborn, hot on his trail, will uncover Ancevo's falling-out among his ranks, and follow the clues left behind to find Erzvasel.


-------

One more dungeon that I hope you all enjoy! Just one ESP to place in your Data folder.

[b]Requirements: [/b]Update, Dragonborn and Dawnguard.
[b]
Warnings: [/b]There's a lot of platforming around, making the first zone unfriendly for followers that are not essential. Lava kills bad.
author: ClefJ
